featured.title: Peyechi.com - AI-Powered Smartphone Discovery Platform
featured.description: A cutting-edge mobile phone recommendation platform engineered for the Bangladesh market. Leveraging advanced AI algorithms and comprehensive device databases, Peyechi empowers users to discover their perfect smartphone through intelligent recommendations, real-time price tracking, and in-depth comparisons. Features AI-powered chat assistant, smart recommendations engine, comprehensive phone database, and Bangladesh-specific pricing support.

projects.title: Employee Retention Analysis
projects.description: Explores employee retention trends using Python, SQL and Power BI visualization.

projects.title: Customer Churn Analysis - From Concept to Creation
projects.description: Built a comprehensive AI-driven customer churn analysis system that generates full analytics dashboards from user requirements and continuously evolves insights. Users can report issues or request improvements directly from the dashboard.

projects.title: Hospital Emergency Room Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard analyzing patient demographics and wait times.
